ssot__ConversationReason__dlm.name: Conversation Reason
ssot__ConversationReason__dlm.description: The Conversation Reason DMO represents the reason a conversation started. It contains aggregated metrics for excerpts, such as cancel order, update order, and check on order status.

ssot__AverageDurationInSeconds__c.description: The average duration of the conversation is in seconds.

ssot__AverageNumOfTurnsNumber__c.description: The average number of turns for the conversation.

ssot__ConversationReasonCategoryId__c.description: A reference ID to the conversation reason category.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the conversation reason DMO.

ssot__ConversationReasonStatusCode__c.description: A reference ID to the conversation reason status code.

ssot__DateSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name for a system that is the source of records identified by the external record ID.

ssot__DateSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for the logical name of the object where this record came from, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connectorâ€™s external object.

ssot__EinsteinScoreNumber__c.description: The Einstein score for the conversation.

ssot__FrequencyPercent__c.description: The frequency percent for the conversation.

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the conversation reason.

ssot__SummaryText__c.description: A summary text for the conversation reason.
